segmentosSRT.text: Who was gambling? I went to watch.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: Mommy will come see you every day.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing, can you ever forgive me?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: I shouldn't have let you go to school.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: I shouldn't have let you go, Youqing!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: I want my son. Give me back my son.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: You killed him! Give him back to me!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: Remember, you owe us a life.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text:
Fengxia! You'll pull through.
Mommy's here. Don't be afraid.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27

segmentosSRT.text: Please, Doctor, she's my only daughter.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_27
